description: A React component for a learner's settings page, including profile, security, notifications, learning preferences, accessibility, privacy, linked accounts, system preferences, support, and account actions.

classes.name: ProfileUser
classes.description: Type defining user profile data including fullName, email, professionalTitle, employeeId, role, department, lastPasswordUpdated.

methods.name: handleProfileSave
methods.description: Asynchronous function to update user profile and synchronize current user state.

methods.name: ProfileSettings
methods.description: Component for editing user profile details, including full name, professional title, and timezone.

methods.name: AccountSecurity
methods.description: Component for managing password change, active sessions, and two-factor authentication (coming soon).

methods.name: NotificationPreferences
methods.description: Component for setting notification preferences including email notifications and reminder frequency.

methods.name: LearningPreferences
methods.description: Component for customizing learning experience such as language, content type, playback speed, and resume settings.

methods.name: AccessibilitySettings
methods.description: Component for adjusting display and accessibility options like font size, high contrast, and captions.

methods.name: PrivacyData
methods.description: Component for privacy settings including profile visibility and data export options.

methods.name: LinkedAccounts
methods.description: Component for managing connected sign-in methods like Google, Microsoft, and SSO.

methods.name: SystemPreferences
methods.description: Component for system appearance and display preferences such as theme, date format, and language.

methods.name: SupportHelp
methods.description: Component providing links to support, ticket creation, and help center.

methods.name: AccountActions
methods.description: Component for account deactivation and organization info.

methods.name: ReadOnlyField
methods.description: Reusable component to display read-only profile data.

methods.name: ToggleRow
methods.description: Reusable toggle switch component with label and optional description.

methods.name: SaveButton
methods.description: Reusable button component for saving changes.
